education.school: Sacred Heart Sr. Sec. School, Chandigarh
Sacred Heart Sr. Sec. School, Chandigarh

projects.name: Sky-react
projects.description: Developed Sky-react, a weather forecasting website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React. Enables users to effortlessly search and retrieve weather information for any location. Offers a user-friendly 5-day forecast with intuitive icons representing various weather conditions.

projects.name: Oil trade classification using R
projects.description: Conducted in-depth analysis of edible oil export data from India, utilizing statistical methods to extract actionable insights on trade dynamics and market trends Implemented data science techniques including data ingestion, storage, processing, and analysis using R Studio, to effectively handle and interpret a large dataset Communicated findings effectively through visual representations and statistical summaries.

full_output.name: Nija Kharangar
achievements_and_awards: INTERNATIONAL HACKATHON WINNER: Smart Healthcare Software Secured third place in MUJHACKX, an international hackathon, won 30K prize money. Built a computer vision software that uses facial recognition, hand gestures and voice recognition for contactless database navigation.
